enchsort.configuration.sort_by_level.too: Sort the enchantments by its level
enchsort.configuration.ascending_sort.to: Sort the enchantments in ascending order
enchsort.configuration.sneak_display.too: Display the original order when shift pressed
enchsort.configuration.compatible_mode.t:
Compatible mode (may cause performance losses)
Enabling this config will disable [show_max_level] and [highlight_treasure]
enchsort.configuration.handle_descriptio:
Properly sort the tooltip if enchantment descriptions are present
(Only needed if you notice issues)
enchsort.configuration.reverse_treasure_: Sort the treasure enchantments in reverse
enchsort.configuration.highlight_treasur: Enable custom highlights for treasure enchantments
enchsort.configuration.treasure_format.t:
The format list of treasure enchantments
Use Formatting code or RGB format (#xxxxxx)
enchsort.configuration.MaxLevel.tooltip: Configurations regarding the enchantment max level
enchsort.configuration.show_max_level.to: Show the max level of the enchantments
The format list of the max level text
Use Formatting code or RGB format (#xxxxxx)
